title: Rutana
text: Rutana is a town in southern <a href="Burundi">Burundi</a>. It lies west of <a href="Mount%20Kikizi">Mount Kikizi</a>, one of the highest <a href="mountain">mountain</a>s in the nation. The <a href="Kagera%20Falls">Kagera Falls</a> lie near the town. It is the capital of <a href="Rutana%20Province">Rutana Province</a>, one of the 18 provinces of <a href="Burundi">Burundi</a>.
